articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: Real Madrid defeat Liverpool to win Champions League - Three main points from match - ESPN India
articles.description: Real Madrid defeated Liverpool 1-0 to win the UEFA Champions League, the 14th European title for the Spanish club. Here are the main talking points.
articles.content:
Real Madrid defeated Liverpool1-0 to win the UEFA Champions League, the 14th European title for the Spanish club. Here are main talking points from the end of the match.

articles.author: Gabriele Marcotti
articles.title: Real Madrid embellish Champions League legacy in beating Liverpool for 14th European title - ESPN
articles.description: Real Madrid have won more than twice as many European Cups as any other team, and that carefree pedigree showed in their latest win over Liverpool.
articles.content:
PARIS -- And now it's 14 for Real Madrid, which is more than the next two most successful clubs in Europe -- AC Milan have seven, Liverpool six -- combined.
And now Carlo Ancelotti has four as a man… [+8711 chars]

articles.title: 'Final' Agreement Makes Abramovich Sale Of Chelsea Soccer Club Highest Ever - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: English Premier League club Chelsea said on May 28 that a "final and definitive agreement" concluded overnight should clear the way for the sports world's highest-ever team sale amid sanctions on Chelsea's billionaire Russian owner.
